definition: to split/to crack/to break open/to rend

sentences.english: The land cracked and the springs dried up and the cattle listlessly nibbled dry twings.
sentences.chinese: 土地龜裂，泉水乾枯，牛兒無精打采地啃着幹樹枝。

sentences.english: Cracks will occur in the region of the thyroid cartilage because of deglutition.
sentences.chinese: 甲狀軟骨部分會由於吞嚥動作而龜裂。

sentences.english: Where heaves the turf in many a mouldering heap.
sentences.chinese: 龜裂的草皮一丘丘隆起。

sentences.english: It eases dry skin and helps to heal cracked and chapped skin quickly.
sentences.chinese: 它能很快的舒緩乾燥的皮膚，輔助治療龜裂的皮膚。

sentences.english: It does not have chap, not damage cars, no circle trace, and call excellent product for various cars.
sentences.chinese: 不龜裂，不花車，無圈跡，堪稱漆面美容之珍品。

sentences.english: This plaster may crack when it dries.
sentences.chinese: 這種灰泥變干時可能會龜裂。

sentences.english: Sometimes because of heavy paint quality question, also can produce crack.
sentences.chinese: 有時因爲重噴漆質量的疑問，也會發作龜裂。

sentences.english: This device in the inspection instep leather and various kinds of thin leather, leather face of things resistance index chapping.
sentences.chinese: 本器在檢驗鞋面革及各種薄物革，皮面之抗龜裂指數。

sentences.english: Preventive and improvable against skin roughness, thickness, slough, and chapping.
sentences.chinese: 預防和對皮膚粗糙，增厚，脫皮，龜裂肌膚。

sentences.english: Otherwise, can damage the material, wood caused by cracking or crisp and easy folding.
sentences.chinese: 否則，會損害其材質，造成木材龜裂或酥脆易折。

sentences.english: This crevice, the hiatus of a gulf of mire, was called a fontis, in the special tongue.
sentences.chinese: 這種裂縫，深淵中污泥的龜裂，專門名詞稱之爲地陷。

sentences.english: The Jinshi Beach, billed as Garden of Queer Stones, boasts the world-famous Turtle Stone.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有“奇石的園林”金石灘，有聞名中外的龜裂石。

sentences.english: One is the cracks and another is formation of hole-opening.
sentences.chinese: 一種是出現裂紋的龜裂粉化。

sentences.english: The parching threatens a quarter of the country’s crop.
sentences.chinese: 龜裂的土地威脅着這個國家四分之一的收成。

sentences.english: Even if the heel had cracked, they have to go to work out.
sentences.chinese: 就算腳後跟已經龜裂，他們也要出門去幹活。

sentences.english: The method of finishing of the cobweb cracked effect leather in the condition high temperature was studied.
sentences.chinese: 系統地研究了高溫蜘蛛網龜裂效應革塗飾方法。

definition: to split open/to dehisce (of fruit or cotton bolls, to split open)
to let air pass through/to ventilate
